participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and outgoing, Emily loves to meet new people and learn from different experiences.
participant_1.background: I have never broken a bone. My favorite food is pizza. I am a freshman in college. I love cats. I am athletic.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, Jake enjoys expressing himself through music and is always eager to try new things.
participant_2.background: I am a fan of system of a down. I own 9 guitars. I learned piano at age 6. I am a vegan. I am trying to play in a local band.

content.text: Hi! I'm a freshman in college, too! What's your favorite thing about college so far?
Hi there! My favorite thing about college is the freedom to explore my interests and meet new people. How about you?
I love the freedom to choose my own classes and the opportunity to learn from professors who are experts in their field. I also love meeting new people from all over the world.
That's awesome! I'm also a big fan of the freedom to choose my own classes. I love being able to learn about whatever I'm interested in.
Me too! I've been taking a lot of classes in my major, but I've also been able to take some electives that I'm really interested in.
That's great! I'm glad you're taking advantage of all that college has to offer.
Thanks! I'm really enjoying my time here so far.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm sure you're going to have a great time the rest of the year.
I love pizza! What about you?
Me too! I love all kinds of pizza, but my favorite is probably pepperoni pizza.
I love pepperoni pizza too! It's so good.
I'm glad to hear that! I think we're going to be good friends.
Me too! I think we'll have a lot in common.
